doc:
Alex Fernandez (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alex_Fernandez_(actor) 0 Alex Fernandez (born July 22, 1967) is an American actor and voice actor who is known primarily for his work on television, most notably as National Security Advisor Anthony Prado on Commander in Chief, Rafael "Rafi" Alvarez on Without a Trace, Roy Vickers on Dallas, or Pablo Diaz on Devious Maids. He was also series regular on ABC's short-lived crime drama Killer Women, playing the role of Luis Zea. Alex_Fernandez ( born July_22_,_1967 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_actor who is_known primarily for his_work on television , most_notably as National_Security_Advisor_Anthony_Prado on Commander in Chief , Rafael_"_Rafi_"_Alvarez on Without a_Trace , Roy_Vickers on Dallas , or Pablo_Diaz on Devious_Maids . He was also series_regular on ABC 's_short-lived_crime_drama_Killer_Women , playing the_role of Luis_Zea .
